name: ES Clicker Simulator
description:
ES Clicker Simulator is a simulator about clicking a button to score points.               These points can then be used to buy upgrades, Upgrades allow you to gain more points from clicking the button! The goal of the game is too gain as many points as you can. 

So hop in and gain as many points as you can!

NOTE: This Game is Heavily inspired by cookie clicker Credit to the developers of cookie clicker
